mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Anisansel, Henry to Pierpont, Francis Harrison
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Anisansel, Henry
mdRecord.dcterms:description: His Excellency Gov Pierpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Dec 7th 1861. By Telegraph from Clarksburg 7th 1861. Have you appointed a third major yet if so I need his services immediately at Romney. Please answer your Respy H Anisansel Col 1st Va C 19D62pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Anisansel, Henry
Clarksburg, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis Harrison
